name: com.reachcloud.metaverse-cloud-sdk
description:
The Unity SDK for the Metaverse Cloud Engine



# Changelog

## 2.200.6
- Refactor upload methods to remove unauthorized retry logic and improve error handling

Updated on October 10, 2025

## 2.200.5
- Refactor logging in LoginStore to use MetaverseProgram.Logger for consistency

Updated on October 10, 2025

## 2.200.4
- Fix initialization retry logic to use Application.isEditor instead of Application.isPlaying

Updated on October 10, 2025

## 2.200.3
- Implement exponential backoff for initialization retries in LoginStore

Updated on October 10, 2025

## 2.200.2
- Add missing Cysharp.Threading.Tasks namespace import in LoginStore

Updated on October 10, 2025

## 2.200.1
- Add exponential backoff for retrying login initialization on server errors

Updated on October 09, 2025

## 2.200.0
- Add logging for API messages and update dependencies

Updated on October 09, 2025

## 2.199.4
- Enhance texture import settings by adding alpha channel detection and refactoring related logic

Updated on October 09, 2025

## 2.199.3
- Fix null reference handling for BlockchainAssets and BlockchainCategories in AssetEditor

Updated on October 09, 2025

## 2.199.2
- Update MetaverseCloudEngine.ApiClient.dll and MetaverseCloudEngine.Common.dll binaries
